如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花多长时间才能打败印度？

接上篇：如果中国和巴基斯坦同时进攻印度，印度会怎么样？类似提问，但是加上了斯里兰卡。
回答一：
Balaji Viswanathan
The result will be a stalemate. Here iswhy:
这场战争最终会演变成一场僵局。原因如下：
First, let us take the low hanging fruit:Sri Lanka. Lankans received massive help from India to prevail over LTTE andend the civil war. The help included military (logistics, patrolling, arms),diplomatic (banning LTTE in Western nations) and political (prevailing overTamilnadu's political parties). Indian central government is the only that canprevail over certain jigoist Tamil groups. Thus, if SL distracts Indian centralgovernment in any way, Tamil nationalist groups could send SL into a massivechaos and civil war. Thus, no way SL would mess with India.
首先，我们从最容易实现的目标开始：斯里兰卡。在印度的大力帮助下，斯里兰卡人战胜了泰米尔猛虎组织，结束了内战，印度的帮助包括军事上（后勤、巡逻、武器）、外交上（在西方国家，禁止了猛虎组织）和政治上（让泰米尔纳德邦政党承认这一点）。印度中央政府是唯一能控制某些泰米尔极端组织的政府。因此，如果斯里兰卡敢用任何方式来对印度施加压力，泰米尔民族主义组织可能会给斯里兰卡送上一场大规模的混乱和内战。因此，斯里兰卡是没有办法干扰印度的。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-1.jpg
Thus, a Pakistan-China axis will neverreally work against India. The resulting mutual destruction is what preventingsuch an alliance from already happening.
因此，中国和巴基斯坦永远不会真正攻击印度，这种行为会产生的破坏性后果正是阻止这种事情发生的原因。
回答二：
Chaitanya Belwal
Chaitanya Belwal, Experienced withTechnology and Defense matters
While this may me a hypothetical scenario,it figures quite prominently in the Indian military's war scenario. Past newssuggest that the Indian military has always accounted for a 2-front war withChina and Pakistan.
Let’s keep Sri Lanka outof this since its military is not large enough to pose a serious threat (Nooffence to the Sri Lankans, but it took them 30 years to get rid of the LTTE,an objective that was almost achieved in 3 years by 4 divisions of the Indianarmy. Contrary to popular perceptions (as presented here) the reality of aSino-Pak-Indo conflict are quite different.
虽然这只是一种假设的情况，但在印度军方的预案里，这是最常见的假设。过去的消息表明，印度军方一直在为同时与中国和巴基斯坦两线作战做准备。
我们先把斯里兰卡排除出去，因为斯里兰卡的军事实力不够，没法对印度构成威胁。（没有冒犯斯里兰卡人的意思，但斯里兰卡花了30年时间，才解决掉泰米尔猛虎组织。而几乎是一样的目标，印度陆军的4个师只用了3年时间就做到了这一点。）
但与大部分人的看法不一样的是，印度与中国和巴基斯坦的冲突情况可能不太一样：
First I differ with one poster who comparesthe Chinese Military (CM) as a world-class boxer, India as street cop andPakistan as a brother to the street cop. If there is one 1000 lb Gorilla (orthe boxer) in the room of world's military powers, it is the US military. Therest, including China, are nothing but street cops with varying degree ofweapons and strength. To reason why, one only has to see that each US Navy CVN(Nuclear carrier) is the 20th largest air force in the world, having some ofthe most sophisticated aircraft , and there are 11 of them. And we are not eventalking about the USAF.
首先，我有一个和大家不太一样的比喻，中国军队，我把它比作是世界级别的拳击手，印度，街头警察，巴基斯坦，同样是街头警察。如果，这些世界军事强国所处的房间里有一只1000磅的大猩猩的话，那就是美国军队。其他国家，包括中国，只不过是拥有不同级别武器和力量的街头警察。我解释一下，我们只需要看一下美国海军的核动力航空母舰，每一艘核动力航空母舰都是世界排名第20的空军，拥有一些最先进的飞机，而美国这样的航空母舰就有11艘，这还没有说道美国的空军。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-2.jpg
Regarding the Navy, though China may have adecent blue water capability it does not yet have the numbers or the experienceto sustain operations in the backyard of the Indian Navy, the 2nd largest Navyin Asia. Indian Navy's 2 Carrier Battle Groups will pose a serious offensivethreat to the surface fleet of both the Pakistan and Chinese navies. A naval blockadeof India is unthinkable since this will bring the entire surface fleet of thePLAN and PN within strike range of shore based bombers and strike aircraft ofthe Indian Navy and air force. Unlike the US Navy or even the Royal Navy, PLANlacks the air support firepower needed to protect its fleet from offensiveground based air operations.
在海军方面，虽然中国有一定的蓝海海军实力，但它如果想要在印度海军（亚洲第二大海军）的后院维持作战的话，它的数量和经验都不足够。印度海军的2个航母战斗群将对巴基斯坦和中国海军的水面舰队构成严重的威胁，而且，想要对印度海军进行封锁也是不可能的，因为实施封锁的水面舰艇会进入印度海军和空军的轰炸机和攻击机的打击范围之内，（它们）与美国海军甚至是英国皇家海军不同的是，它们缺乏保护其舰队免受地面攻击所需的空中支援火力。
The PLAAF has a distinct advantage, atleast on paper. With 3000+ combat aircraft supported by mid-air refuellers thePLAAF is a force to recon with. However apart from 250+ SU30MKK’s, 200+Su-27s and 200+ JF-17’s rest of these aircraft are vintage Chinese variants of MiG 19 andMiG 21s. In the context of Sino-Indian conflict, China has primarily 6 airbasesto launch strike aircraft from. However, all of these have altitudes in excessof 4000 ft, which means the strike aircraft taking off will be carrying lesserpayload. A PLAAF Su-30MKK for example, will take off with 6 AA missiles ratherthan 8. All IAF airbases bordering China primarily those in Bareilly, Tezpur,Hindon and Bagdodra, are at near sea level allowing Indian Su30MKI to takeoffat full payload.
至少在纸面数据上，中国空军具有明显的优势，它们拥有3000多架战斗机，有空中加油机能够提供支援。然而，除了250多架苏30、200多架苏27以及200多架JF-17之外，其余的飞机都是中国由米格19和米格21改型来的老旧机种。如果中国和印度发生冲突，中国的战斗机将在6个主要的空军基地起飞，然而，这些基地海拔都在1000米以上，这意味着这些飞机起飞时的有效载荷有限。比如中国军队的苏30只能搭载6枚防空导弹，而不是8枚，而所有与中国接壤的印度空军基地，主要包括巴雷利、泰兹普尔、印顿和巴格杜德拉，水平高度都和海平面接近，这使得印度空军的苏30战机能够满负荷起飞。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-3.jpg
To conclude India vs China-Pakistan warwill end in stalemate at best, and won’t give any tacticalor strategic advantage to any nation. So much so that it’s motivationitself will be in doubt.
所以，印度和中国以及巴基斯坦的战争，最终会是一场僵局，不会给任何国家带来任何方面的好处。所以这场战争发动的动机本身就会让人质疑。
Mark Harrison
Mark Harrison, CTO, werarewe
Let us review the relative militarystrengths:
China is a world class power, with astructured and trained military
India has a military force more accustomedto 'local enforcement' actions, but not world-class
Pakistan is like a scaled down version ofIndia, aggressive, but less disciplined.
Sri Lanka has little military power.
Now, suppose Pakistan, China and Sri Lankadecided to invade India. India would be most worried by China.
让我们来看一下相关国家的军事实力：
中国是一个世界级的大国，拥有一支训练有素的军队。
印度的军事力量更倾向于“地方执法”级别，还达不到世界级的水平。
巴基斯坦类似一个缩小版的印度，侵略性强，但纪律性差。
斯里兰卡几乎就没有军事力量。
现在，假设巴基斯坦、中国和斯里兰卡决定入侵印度。印度最担心的会是中国。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/86/28786/comment-1.jpg
However, suppose that this is not the case.Then it's a full offensive for strategic goals, with China determined to causemajor damage to India. India would be determined not to surrender. However,India might, in confusion, launch a larger than intended strike against SriLanka causing major damage. It is also likely that some Chinese offensiveswould cause collateral damage to Pakistan, which would combine with some Indiancounter-attack.
但如果，情况并非假设的这样，中国下定决心要对印度造成重大伤害，发动对战略目标的全面进攻的话，印度将不会投降。混乱之中，印度可能会对斯里兰卡发动一场比预期更大的打击，造成重大的伤害，中国的一些进攻也可能会对巴基斯坦造成附带伤害。
The Indian leadership would realise that,if they continued to fight China, the damage would be permanent. However, theyare a nuclear power. But then, China isa nuclear power too. Both of them would issue warnings about their intentionsto deploy nuclear weapons. Pakistan would also warn about its intentions todeploy nuclear weapons. India and China would not take this threat seriously,but Pakistan would repeat its threats. Again, India and China would point outthat nuclear weapons had a mutually assured destruction capability, but bothwould be nervous of Pakistans willingness to engage in such a strategy. Chinesecollateral damage against Pakistan would increase. As the situation escalated,the conventional battle between India and China would intensify, but both wouldremain non-nuclear.
印度领导人这时候会意识到，如果他们继续与中国作战，将会带来永久性的伤害。然而，他们是一个核武器国家，但中国也是一个核大国。两个国家都会对对方试图使用核武器发出警告，巴基斯坦也会威胁使用核武器，但印度和中国都不会认真地对待这一威胁，巴基斯坦会一再重复它的威胁，印度和中国会不断的重申：核武器具有相互摧毁的能力，但这两个国家都会对巴基斯坦的这种姿态感到紧张。中国对巴基斯坦的附带伤害将会增加，随着局势的升级，印度和中国之间的常规战争会加剧，但两个国家都不会使用核武器。
At this point, three other powers need tobe considered - the USA, the UK, and Russia. The USA is hostile to China andits policy towards Pakistan has swung. The USA, dominant in global militaryterms, has demonstrated this against countries like Iraq and Afghanistan, andits troops have actual military experience. So, America is feared. The UK andRussia, by comparison, have reputations, but little interest in engagingin-theatre. They are all, however, unhappy with China because of its economicdominance.
这种情况下，还需要考虑其他三个大国的态度——美国、英国和俄罗斯。美国对中国怀有敌意，对巴基斯坦的政策也有所改变。美国在军事实力上占主导地位，在伊拉克和阿富汗等国家已经证明了这一点，它们的军队拥有实战经验。相比之下，英国和俄罗斯也有强大实力，但是对参与的兴趣很低，不过，他们都对中国的经济优势感到不满。
Now, they realise that with India damaged,China will be dominant in Asia. They realise that this would make China adirect threat to their own strategic interests. They also know that Chinaultimately aims to take full control of Asia. They are also aware that thenuclear option would cause global devastation.
现在，他们意识到，随着印度的受伤，中国将在亚洲占主导地位，这会让中国直接威胁到他们自己的战略利益。他们还知道，中国最终的目标是全面控制亚洲，而且他们还意识到，核战争会导致全世界的毁灭。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/86/28786/comment-2.jpg
There is structural damage to both Indiaand China. One fourth of India needs rebuilding, but it retains sovereigntyover the land. Sri Lanka is defeated. Nepal has also taken major damage.
印度和中国都受到了结构性的破坏，四分之一的印度需要重建，但它保留了对这片土地的主权，斯里兰卡被打败了，尼泊尔也遭受了重大损失。
Meanwhile, Japan and Germany are rejoicingat the fact that Chinese competition has been put out of business.
同时，日本和德国对将中国从国际贸易中挤出去感到高兴。
Strikes me as a serious description...maybe the metaphor was unfortunate, and there may be holes in the scenario...but not a joke answer...
我最在意的是，也许我的这个答案有点悲惨，这些假想可能有漏洞…但这个答案我不是在开玩笑。

Siddhesh Shivraj
Siddhesh Shivraj, growing up
In the modern era i don't think it shouldlast for more than 10 days. Since this being a hypothetical question, I wouldgive it a hypothetical build up which lasts for a few days.
DAY 1:
In a war i guess it would be Pakistan whichwould be the first to attack India, even if all 3 wage a war together,considering Pakistan being the closest and the being a childhood rival toIndia. On the very first day, Pakistan's strategy would be using POK to makein-roads into India. Their first strategy would be using the land-ways to makeinroads to Kashmir valley.
在现代战争中，这样的战争持续时间不会超过10天，因为这是一个假设性的问题，所以我假想一下这场战争接下来几天的走向。
战争的第1天：
在这场战争中，就算这三个国家是联手发动对印度的战争，但我认为巴基斯坦会是第一个攻击印度的国家，因为巴基斯坦离印度最近，也是印度一直以来的对手。在第一天时间里，巴基斯坦会直接打通一条进入印度的通道，他们的策略是通过陆路进入克什米尔山谷。
This beginning at the start of DAY 1, alongwith invasion on the lines of Punjab and rajasthan as well, all done by thePakistan Army. Now in kashmir, The pakistani army would have to face the IndianArmy. Now moving on all ground forces are engaged in battle,meanwhile CHINA ispreparing to come onto INDIA by moving their armed forces in a hurry to thenorth-indian border.
第一天开始，巴基斯坦军队入侵旁遮普和拉贾斯坦邦，然后在克什米尔，巴基斯坦军队遇到了印度军队。现在，所有的地面部队都参与了战斗，与此同时，中国准备把他们的武装部队快速地转移到印度北部边界地区，进入印度。
It's a huge movement of troops which shouldtake a complete day, if not prepared in advanced. Since China is going to beinvolved in action by day 2 only as they have to move across tibet. On DAY 1itself we are having an intensified battles at the border. We have stationedour ARJUN MBT's and are using our BOFORS for shelling. By the end of DAY 1, noside has made any marginal gains not india or pakistan. China is still movingits troops into tibet, Sri Lanka on the other hand is still contemplating ifthey should resurrect a country savaged by civil war or jump into another war.
这会是一次大规模的部队调动，如果没有提前做好准备，这需要一整天的时间，所以，中国会在第二天才开始采取大规模行动。第一天，在边境地区我们展开了一场激战，我们有阿琼主战坦克，并使用防空炮进行炮击。
到当天结束的时候，双方在边境上都没有任何进展，当然了，印度和巴基斯坦边境除外，中国仍在调遣军队，而斯里兰卡仍在考虑是否让自己国家重新陷入内战之中，或者发动另一场战争。
DAY 2:
By the beginning of day 2, Pakistan hasbeen contemplating launching thier missiles, onto major Indian cities targetingcities like Delhi,Mumbai and kolkata.They would be trying to target deep intothe Indian territory. But here is the biggest problem for Pakistan. They needthier mobile launchers to be as close to the Indian territory as possible. I am petty sure they would try to usertheir missiles Ghauri and the missile systems, now these need mobile launchersas they are not compatible to be fired from a aircraft or frigate or adestroyer.
战争的第2天：
到了战争的第二天，巴基斯坦考虑向印度的主要城市，如德里、孟买和加尔各答发射导弹。他们会把导弹对准印度内部，但这里巴基斯坦面临的最大问题是：他们需要让导弹发射系统尽可能地靠近印度。我可以肯定，巴基斯坦会使用自己的导弹，现在，他们需要让他们的发射装置移动起来，因为这些导弹不能从战斗机或者军舰上发射。

Brahmos is the world fastest supersonicmissile which can cruise at 3 Mach easily and has a range of 300 KMS. Sukhoi 30MKI (are multi-role fighters) are primarily air to air superiority fighters andwill be flanked by our Dassault Mirage and Mig 29's for air to ground bombingwiping out SAM systems of pak. We have 180 Sukhoi 30 MKI operational at any given time and say weengage 40 to engage with Pakistan Air force along with ground force. Our rafaleand MIG 29 are capable of handling j-10's and f-16's. PAF j10 and f-16 are notbe compared with sukoi 30 MKI whcih is a generation ahead in avionics, they candeal with our rafale and mig 29. With the Missile bases wiped out and takinga deadly hit in aerial warfare Pakistan is on its back heels on day 2 itself.pre-emptive nuclear strike is out of the question now.

Day 3:
Pakistan on the backfoot. Its naval forcestry to take on the Indian navy ; fails miserably because Indian Air forceswould again come into picture while handling out air to ground bombs on PNFwhile INF will use it submarines which are brahmos capable to neutralise PNF (Pakistan Naval FOrce ). Historcally Pakistan never had a great naval force.They have a good Air force but completely outdated f-16 which were superior toour force in the 90's; not now, because we have AWACS, Israeli avionics in oursystems along with our in-house BARS radar systems.
战争的第3天：
巴基斯坦已经落在下风了。巴基斯坦海军试图与印度海军交战，但惨遭失败，印度空军攻击巴基斯坦导弹基地的画面会重现，印度海军的布拉莫斯潜射导弹，会消灭巴基斯坦海军。巴基斯坦历史上海军实力一直不咋的，他们的空军还不错，但F16已经过时了，在90年代，他们比我们先进，现在不是了，因为我们的武器系统中预警机、以色列的航电设备以及我们自己的雷达系统。

They have 200 j-10's , 70 sukhoi 30mkk, 140 j-11'sand another 70 sukhoi su-27.The j-10's and j-11's are home grown aircrafts withdomestic avionics. I strongly believe that our Sukhoi Squadron with avionicsand its BVR capability will be easily able to take over the j10 and j11's ifPLAAF plans to deploy them.

But since china is smart it would surelynot use its air-force but its missile systems with full effect.China has themost feared missile systems. Below is the list of missiles they will use tocripple India’s strength points:
Dong Feng 31 (10,000+ km)

item.description:
如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花... If China, Pakistan and Sri Lanka attack India at the same time, how long will it take them to defeat India?
如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花多长时间才能打败印度？
http://img.ltaaa.com/uploadfile/thumb/2019/06/21//1561080505845.jpg
评论翻译
原创翻译：龙腾网 http://www.ltaaa.com 翻译：squart 转载请注明出处
论坛地址：http://www.ltaaa.com/bbs/thread-486873-1-1.html
接上篇：如果中国和巴基斯坦同时进攻印度，印度会怎么样？类似提问，但是加上了斯里兰卡。
回答一：
Balaji Viswanathan
The result will be a stalemate. Here iswhy:
这场战争最终会演变成一场僵局。原因如下：
First, let us take the low hanging fruit:Sri Lanka. Lankans received massive help from India to prevail over LTTE andend the civil war. The help included military (logistics, patrolling, arms),diplomatic (banning LTTE in Western nations) and political (prevailing overTamilnadu's political parties). Indian central government is the only that canprevail over certain jigoist Tamil groups. Thus, if SL distracts Indian centralgovernment in any way, Tamil nationalist groups could send SL into a massivechaos and civil war. Thus, no way SL would mess with India.
首先，我们从最容易实现的目标开始：斯里兰卡。在印度的大力帮助下，斯里兰卡人战胜了泰米尔猛虎组织，结束了内战，印度的帮助包括军事上（后勤、巡逻、武器）、外交上（在西方国家，禁止了猛虎组织）和政治上（让泰米尔纳德邦政党承认这一点）。印度中央政府是唯一能控制某些泰米尔极端组织的政府。因此，如果斯里兰卡敢用任何方式来对印度施加压力，泰米尔民族主义组织可能会给斯里兰卡送上一场大规模的混乱和内战。因此，斯里兰卡是没有办法干扰印度的。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-1.jpg
Thus, a Pakistan-China axis will neverreally work against India. The resulting mutual destruction is what preventingsuch an alliance from already happening.
因此，中国和巴基斯坦永远不会真正攻击印度，这种行为会产生的破坏性后果正是阻止这种事情发生的原因。
回答二：
Chaitanya Belwal
Chaitanya Belwal, Experienced withTechnology and Defense matters
While this may me a hypothetical scenario,it figures quite prominently in the Indian military's war scenario. Past newssuggest that the Indian military has always accounted for a 2-front war withChina and Pakistan.
Let’s keep Sri Lanka outof this since its military is not large enough to pose a serious threat (Nooffence to the Sri Lankans, but it took them 30 years to get rid of the LTTE,an objective that was almost achieved in 3 years by 4 divisions of the Indianarmy. Contrary to popular perceptions (as presented here) the reality of aSino-Pak-Indo conflict are quite different.
虽然这只是一种假设的情况，但在印度军方的预案里，这是最常见的假设。过去的消息表明，印度军方一直在为同时与中国和巴基斯坦两线作战做准备。
我们先把斯里兰卡排除出去，因为斯里兰卡的军事实力不够，没法对印度构成威胁。（没有冒犯斯里兰卡人的意思，但斯里兰卡花了30年时间，才解决掉泰米尔猛虎组织。而几乎是一样的目标，印度陆军的4个师只用了3年时间就做到了这一点。）
但与大部分人的看法不一样的是，印度与中国和巴基斯坦的冲突情况可能不太一样：
First I differ with one poster who comparesthe Chinese Military (CM) as a world-class boxer, India as street cop andPakistan as a brother to the street cop. If there is one 1000 lb Gorilla (orthe boxer) in the room of world's military powers, it is the US military. Therest, including China, are nothing but street cops with varying degree ofweapons and strength. To reason why, one only has to see that each US Navy CVN(Nuclear carrier) is the 20th largest air force in the world, having some ofthe most sophisticated aircraft , and there are 11 of them. And we are not eventalking about the USAF.
首先，我有一个和大家不太一样的比喻，中国军队，我把它比作是世界级别的拳击手，印度，街头警察，巴基斯坦，同样是街头警察。如果，这些世界军事强国所处的房间里有一只1000磅的大猩猩的话，那就是美国军队。其他国家，包括中国，只不过是拥有不同级别武器和力量的街头警察。我解释一下，我们只需要看一下美国海军的核动力航空母舰，每一艘核动力航空母舰都是世界排名第20的空军，拥有一些最先进的飞机，而美国这样的航空母舰就有11艘，这还没有说道美国的空军。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-2.jpg
Regarding the Navy, though China may have adecent blue water capability it does not yet have the numbers or the experienceto sustain operations in the backyard of the Indian Navy, the 2nd largest Navyin Asia. Indian Navy's 2 Carrier Battle Groups will pose a serious offensivethreat to the surface fleet of both the Pakistan and Chinese navies. A naval blockadeof India is unthinkable since this will bring the entire surface fleet of thePLAN and PN within strike range of shore based bombers and strike aircraft ofthe Indian Navy and air force. Unlike the US Navy or even the Royal Navy, PLANlacks the air support firepower needed to protect its fleet from offensiveground based air operations.
在海军方面，虽然中国有一定的蓝海海军实力，但它如果想要在印度海军（亚洲第二大海军）的后院维持作战的话，它的数量和经验都不足够。印度海军的2个航母战斗群将对巴基斯坦和中国海军的水面舰队构成严重的威胁，而且，想要对印度海军进行封锁也是不可能的，因为实施封锁的水面舰艇会进入印度海军和空军的轰炸机和攻击机的打击范围之内，（它们）与美国海军甚至是英国皇家海军不同的是，它们缺乏保护其舰队免受地面攻击所需的空中支援火力。
The PLAAF has a distinct advantage, atleast on paper. With 3000+ combat aircraft supported by mid-air refuellers thePLAAF is a force to recon with. However apart from 250+ SU30MKK’s, 200+Su-27s and 200+ JF-17’s rest of these aircraft are vintage Chinese variants of MiG 19 andMiG 21s. In the context of Sino-Indian conflict, China has primarily 6 airbasesto launch strike aircraft from. However, all of these have altitudes in excessof 4000 ft, which means the strike aircraft taking off will be carrying lesserpayload. A PLAAF Su-30MKK for example, will take off with 6 AA missiles ratherthan 8. All IAF airbases bordering China primarily those in Bareilly, Tezpur,Hindon and Bagdodra, are at near sea level allowing Indian Su30MKI to takeoffat full payload.
至少在纸面数据上，中国空军具有明显的优势，它们拥有3000多架战斗机，有空中加油机能够提供支援。然而，除了250多架苏30、200多架苏27以及200多架JF-17之外，其余的飞机都是中国由米格19和米格21改型来的老旧机种。如果中国和印度发生冲突，中国的战斗机将在6个主要的空军基地起飞，然而，这些基地海拔都在1000米以上，这意味着这些飞机起飞时的有效载荷有限。比如中国军队的苏30只能搭载6枚防空导弹，而不是8枚，而所有与中国接壤的印度空军基地，主要包括巴雷利、泰兹普尔、印顿和巴格杜德拉，水平高度都和海平面接近，这使得印度空军的苏30战机能够满负荷起飞。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-3.jpg
To conclude India vs China-Pakistan warwill end in stalemate at best, and won’t give any tacticalor strategic advantage to any nation. So much so that it’s motivationitself will be in doubt.
所以，印度和中国以及巴基斯坦的战争，最终会是一场僵局，不会给任何国家带来任何方面的好处。所以这场战争发动的动机本身就会让人质疑。
Mark Harrison
Mark Harrison, CTO, werarewe
Let us review the relative militarystrengths:

item.title: 如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花...[0-50]
item.description:
如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花... If China, Pakistan and Sri Lanka attack India at the same time, how long will it take them to defeat India?
如果中国、巴基斯坦和斯里兰卡同时攻击印度，他们要花多长时间才能打败印度？
http://img.ltaaa.com/uploadfile/thumb/2019/06/21//1561080505845.jpg
评论翻译
原创翻译：龙腾网 http://www.ltaaa.com 翻译：squart 转载请注明出处
论坛地址：http://www.ltaaa.com/bbs/thread-486873-1-1.html
接上篇：如果中国和巴基斯坦同时进攻印度，印度会怎么样？类似提问，但是加上了斯里兰卡。
回答一：
Balaji Viswanathan
The result will be a stalemate. Here iswhy:
这场战争最终会演变成一场僵局。原因如下：
First, let us take the low hanging fruit:Sri Lanka. Lankans received massive help from India to prevail over LTTE andend the civil war. The help included military (logistics, patrolling, arms),diplomatic (banning LTTE in Western nations) and political (prevailing overTamilnadu's political parties). Indian central government is the only that canprevail over certain jigoist Tamil groups. Thus, if SL distracts Indian centralgovernment in any way, Tamil nationalist groups could send SL into a massivechaos and civil war. Thus, no way SL would mess with India.
首先，我们从最容易实现的目标开始：斯里兰卡。在印度的大力帮助下，斯里兰卡人战胜了泰米尔猛虎组织，结束了内战，印度的帮助包括军事上（后勤、巡逻、武器）、外交上（在西方国家，禁止了猛虎组织）和政治上（让泰米尔纳德邦政党承认这一点）。印度中央政府是唯一能控制某些泰米尔极端组织的政府。因此，如果斯里兰卡敢用任何方式来对印度施加压力，泰米尔民族主义组织可能会给斯里兰卡送上一场大规模的混乱和内战。因此，斯里兰卡是没有办法干扰印度的。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-1.jpg
Thus, a Pakistan-China axis will neverreally work against India. The resulting mutual destruction is what preventingsuch an alliance from already happening.
因此，中国和巴基斯坦永远不会真正攻击印度，这种行为会产生的破坏性后果正是阻止这种事情发生的原因。
回答二：
Chaitanya Belwal
Chaitanya Belwal, Experienced withTechnology and Defense matters
While this may me a hypothetical scenario,it figures quite prominently in the Indian military's war scenario. Past newssuggest that the Indian military has always accounted for a 2-front war withChina and Pakistan.
Let’s keep Sri Lanka outof this since its military is not large enough to pose a serious threat (Nooffence to the Sri Lankans, but it took them 30 years to get rid of the LTTE,an objective that was almost achieved in 3 years by 4 divisions of the Indianarmy. Contrary to popular perceptions (as presented here) the reality of aSino-Pak-Indo conflict are quite different.
虽然这只是一种假设的情况，但在印度军方的预案里，这是最常见的假设。过去的消息表明，印度军方一直在为同时与中国和巴基斯坦两线作战做准备。
我们先把斯里兰卡排除出去，因为斯里兰卡的军事实力不够，没法对印度构成威胁。（没有冒犯斯里兰卡人的意思，但斯里兰卡花了30年时间，才解决掉泰米尔猛虎组织。而几乎是一样的目标，印度陆军的4个师只用了3年时间就做到了这一点。）
但与大部分人的看法不一样的是，印度与中国和巴基斯坦的冲突情况可能不太一样：
First I differ with one poster who comparesthe Chinese Military (CM) as a world-class boxer, India as street cop andPakistan as a brother to the street cop. If there is one 1000 lb Gorilla (orthe boxer) in the room of world's military powers, it is the US military. Therest, including China, are nothing but street cops with varying degree ofweapons and strength. To reason why, one only has to see that each US Navy CVN(Nuclear carrier) is the 20th largest air force in the world, having some ofthe most sophisticated aircraft , and there are 11 of them. And we are not eventalking about the USAF.
首先，我有一个和大家不太一样的比喻，中国军队，我把它比作是世界级别的拳击手，印度，街头警察，巴基斯坦，同样是街头警察。如果，这些世界军事强国所处的房间里有一只1000磅的大猩猩的话，那就是美国军队。其他国家，包括中国，只不过是拥有不同级别武器和力量的街头警察。我解释一下，我们只需要看一下美国海军的核动力航空母舰，每一艘核动力航空母舰都是世界排名第20的空军，拥有一些最先进的飞机，而美国这样的航空母舰就有11艘，这还没有说道美国的空军。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-2.jpg
Regarding the Navy, though China may have adecent blue water capability it does not yet have the numbers or the experienceto sustain operations in the backyard of the Indian Navy, the 2nd largest Navyin Asia. Indian Navy's 2 Carrier Battle Groups will pose a serious offensivethreat to the surface fleet of both the Pakistan and Chinese navies. A naval blockadeof India is unthinkable since this will bring the entire surface fleet of thePLAN and PN within strike range of shore based bombers and strike aircraft ofthe Indian Navy and air force. Unlike the US Navy or even the Royal Navy, PLANlacks the air support firepower needed to protect its fleet from offensiveground based air operations.
在海军方面，虽然中国有一定的蓝海海军实力，但它如果想要在印度海军（亚洲第二大海军）的后院维持作战的话，它的数量和经验都不足够。印度海军的2个航母战斗群将对巴基斯坦和中国海军的水面舰队构成严重的威胁，而且，想要对印度海军进行封锁也是不可能的，因为实施封锁的水面舰艇会进入印度海军和空军的轰炸机和攻击机的打击范围之内，（它们）与美国海军甚至是英国皇家海军不同的是，它们缺乏保护其舰队免受地面攻击所需的空中支援火力。
The PLAAF has a distinct advantage, atleast on paper. With 3000+ combat aircraft supported by mid-air refuellers thePLAAF is a force to recon with. However apart from 250+ SU30MKK’s, 200+Su-27s and 200+ JF-17’s rest of these aircraft are vintage Chinese variants of MiG 19 andMiG 21s. In the context of Sino-Indian conflict, China has primarily 6 airbasesto launch strike aircraft from. However, all of these have altitudes in excessof 4000 ft, which means the strike aircraft taking off will be carrying lesserpayload. A PLAAF Su-30MKK for example, will take off with 6 AA missiles ratherthan 8. All IAF airbases bordering China primarily those in Bareilly, Tezpur,Hindon and Bagdodra, are at near sea level allowing Indian Su30MKI to takeoffat full payload.
至少在纸面数据上，中国空军具有明显的优势，它们拥有3000多架战斗机，有空中加油机能够提供支援。然而，除了250多架苏30、200多架苏27以及200多架JF-17之外，其余的飞机都是中国由米格19和米格21改型来的老旧机种。如果中国和印度发生冲突，中国的战斗机将在6个主要的空军基地起飞，然而，这些基地海拔都在1000米以上，这意味着这些飞机起飞时的有效载荷有限。比如中国军队的苏30只能搭载6枚防空导弹，而不是8枚，而所有与中国接壤的印度空军基地，主要包括巴雷利、泰兹普尔、印顿和巴格杜德拉，水平高度都和海平面接近，这使得印度空军的苏30战机能够满负荷起飞。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/85/28785/comment-3.jpg
To conclude India vs China-Pakistan warwill end in stalemate at best, and won’t give any tacticalor strategic advantage to any nation. So much so that it’s motivationitself will be in doubt.
所以，印度和中国以及巴基斯坦的战争，最终会是一场僵局，不会给任何国家带来任何方面的好处。所以这场战争发动的动机本身就会让人质疑。
Mark Harrison
Mark Harrison, CTO, werarewe
Let us review the relative militarystrengths:
China is a world class power, with astructured and trained military
India has a military force more accustomedto 'local enforcement' actions, but not world-class
Pakistan is like a scaled down version ofIndia, aggressive, but less disciplined.
Sri Lanka has little military power.
Now, suppose Pakistan, China and Sri Lankadecided to invade India. India would be most worried by China.
让我们来看一下相关国家的军事实力：
中国是一个世界级的大国，拥有一支训练有素的军队。
印度的军事力量更倾向于“地方执法”级别，还达不到世界级的水平。
巴基斯坦类似一个缩小版的印度，侵略性强，但纪律性差。
斯里兰卡几乎就没有军事力量。
现在，假设巴基斯坦、中国和斯里兰卡决定入侵印度。印度最担心的会是中国。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/86/28786/comment-1.jpg
However, suppose that this is not the case.Then it's a full offensive for strategic goals, with China determined to causemajor damage to India. India would be determined not to surrender. However,India might, in confusion, launch a larger than intended strike against SriLanka causing major damage. It is also likely that some Chinese offensiveswould cause collateral damage to Pakistan, which would combine with some Indiancounter-attack.
但如果，情况并非假设的这样，中国下定决心要对印度造成重大伤害，发动对战略目标的全面进攻的话，印度将不会投降。混乱之中，印度可能会对斯里兰卡发动一场比预期更大的打击，造成重大的伤害，中国的一些进攻也可能会对巴基斯坦造成附带伤害。
The Indian leadership would realise that,if they continued to fight China, the damage would be permanent. However, theyare a nuclear power. But then, China isa nuclear power too. Both of them would issue warnings about their intentionsto deploy nuclear weapons. Pakistan would also warn about its intentions todeploy nuclear weapons. India and China would not take this threat seriously,but Pakistan would repeat its threats. Again, India and China would point outthat nuclear weapons had a mutually assured destruction capability, but bothwould be nervous of Pakistans willingness to engage in such a strategy. Chinesecollateral damage against Pakistan would increase. As the situation escalated,the conventional battle between India and China would intensify, but both wouldremain non-nuclear.
印度领导人这时候会意识到，如果他们继续与中国作战，将会带来永久性的伤害。然而，他们是一个核武器国家，但中国也是一个核大国。两个国家都会对对方试图使用核武器发出警告，巴基斯坦也会威胁使用核武器，但印度和中国都不会认真地对待这一威胁，巴基斯坦会一再重复它的威胁，印度和中国会不断的重申：核武器具有相互摧毁的能力，但这两个国家都会对巴基斯坦的这种姿态感到紧张。中国对巴基斯坦的附带伤害将会增加，随着局势的升级，印度和中国之间的常规战争会加剧，但两个国家都不会使用核武器。
At this point, three other powers need tobe considered - the USA, the UK, and Russia. The USA is hostile to China andits policy towards Pakistan has swung. The USA, dominant in global militaryterms, has demonstrated this against countries like Iraq and Afghanistan, andits troops have actual military experience. So, America is feared. The UK andRussia, by comparison, have reputations, but little interest in engagingin-theatre. They are all, however, unhappy with China because of its economicdominance.
这种情况下，还需要考虑其他三个大国的态度——美国、英国和俄罗斯。美国对中国怀有敌意，对巴基斯坦的政策也有所改变。美国在军事实力上占主导地位，在伊拉克和阿富汗等国家已经证明了这一点，它们的军队拥有实战经验。相比之下，英国和俄罗斯也有强大实力，但是对参与的兴趣很低，不过，他们都对中国的经济优势感到不满。
Now, they realise that with India damaged,China will be dominant in Asia. They realise that this would make China adirect threat to their own strategic interests. They also know that Chinaultimately aims to take full control of Asia. They are also aware that thenuclear option would cause global devastation.
现在，他们意识到，随着印度的受伤，中国将在亚洲占主导地位，这会让中国直接威胁到他们自己的战略利益。他们还知道，中国最终的目标是全面控制亚洲，而且他们还意识到，核战争会导致全世界的毁灭。
http://www.ltaaa.com/postmake/86/28786/comment-2.jpg
There is structural damage to both Indiaand China. One fourth of India needs rebuilding, but it retains sovereigntyover the land. Sri Lanka is defeated. Nepal has also taken major damage.
印度和中国都受到了结构性的破坏，四分之一的印度需要重建，但它保留了对这片土地的主权，斯里兰卡被打败了，尼泊尔也遭受了重大损失。
Meanwhile, Japan and Germany are rejoicingat the fact that Chinese competition has been put out of business.

The result will be a stalemate. Here iswhy:
这场战争最终会演变成一场僵局。原因如下：
First, let us take the low hanging fruit:Sri Lanka. Lankans received massive help from India to prevail over LTTE andend the civil war. The help included military (logistics, patrolling, arms),diplomatic (banning LTTE in Western nations) and political (prevailing overTamilnadu's political parties). Indian central government is the only that canprevail over certain jigoist Tamil groups. Thus, if SL distracts Indian centralgovernment in any way, Tamil nationalist groups could send SL into a massivechaos and civil war. Thus, no way SL would mess with India.
首先，我们从最容易实现的目标开始：斯里兰卡。在印度的大力帮助下，斯里兰卡人战胜了泰米尔猛虎组织，结束了内战，印度的帮助包括军事上（后勤、巡逻、武器）、外交上（在西方国家，禁止了猛虎组织）和政治上（让泰米尔纳德邦政党承认这一点）。印度中央政府是唯一能控制某些泰米尔极端组织的政府。因此，如果斯里兰卡敢用任何方式来对印度施加压力，泰米尔民族主义组织可能会给斯里兰卡送上一场大规模的混乱和内战。因此，斯里兰卡是没有办法干扰印度的。

Thus, a Pakistan-China axis will neverreally work against India. The resulting mutual destruction is what preventingsuch an alliance from already happening.
因此，中国和巴基斯坦永远不会真正攻击印度，这种行为会产生的破坏性后果正是阻止这种事情发生的原因。
回答二：
Chaitanya Belwal
Chaitanya Belwal, Experienced withTechnology and Defense matters
While this may me a hypothetical scenario,it figures quite prominently in the Indian military's war scenario. Past newssuggest that the Indian military has always accounted for a 2-front war withChina and Pakistan.
Let’s keep Sri Lanka outof this since its military is not large enough to pose a serious threat (Nooffence to the Sri Lankans, but it took them 30 years to get rid of the LTTE,an objective that was almost achieved in 3 years by 4 divisions of the Indianarmy. Contrary to popular perceptions (as presented here) the reality of aSino-Pak-Indo conflict are quite different.
虽然这只是一种假设的情况，但在印度军方的预案里，这是最常见的假设。过去的消息表明，印度军方一直在为同时与中国和巴基斯坦两线作战做准备。
我们先把斯里兰卡排除出去，因为斯里兰卡的军事实力不够，没法对印度构成威胁。（没有冒犯斯里兰卡人的意思，但斯里兰卡花了30年时间，才解决掉泰米尔猛虎组织。而几乎是一样的目标，印度陆军的4个师只用了3年时间就做到了这一点。）
但与大部分人的看法不一样的是，印度与中国和巴基斯坦的冲突情况可能不太一样：
First I differ with one poster who comparesthe Chinese Military (CM) as a world-class boxer, India as street cop andPakistan as a brother to the street cop. If there is one 1000 lb Gorilla (orthe boxer) in the room of world's military powers, it is the US military. Therest, including China, are nothing but street cops with varying degree ofweapons and strength. To reason why, one only has to see that each US Navy CVN(Nuclear carrier) is the 20th largest air force in the world, having some ofthe most sophisticated aircraft , and there are 11 of them. And we are not eventalking about the USAF.
首先，我有一个和大家不太一样的比喻，中国军队，我把它比作是世界级别的拳击手，印度，街头警察，巴基斯坦，同样是街头警察。如果，这些世界军事强国所处的房间里有一只1000磅的大猩猩的话，那就是美国军队。其他国家，包括中国，只不过是拥有不同级别武器和力量的街头警察。我解释一下，我们只需要看一下美国海军的核动力航空母舰，每一艘核动力航空母舰都是世界排名第20的空军，拥有一些最先进的飞机，而美国这样的航空母舰就有11艘，这还没有说道美国的空军。

Regarding the Navy, though China may have adecent blue water capability it does not yet have the numbers or the experienceto sustain operations in the backyard of the Indian Navy, the 2nd largest Navyin Asia. Indian Navy's 2 Carrier Battle Groups will pose a serious offensivethreat to the surface fleet of both the Pakistan and Chinese navies. A naval blockadeof India is unthinkable since this will bring the entire surface fleet of thePLAN and PN within strike range of shore based bombers and strike aircraft ofthe Indian Navy and air force. Unlike the US Navy or even the Royal Navy, PLANlacks the air support firepower needed to protect its fleet from offensiveground based air operations.
在海军方面，虽然中国有一定的蓝海海军实力，但它如果想要在印度海军（亚洲第二大海军）的后院维持作战的话，它的数量和经验都不足够。印度海军的2个航母战斗群将对巴基斯坦和中国海军的水面舰队构成严重的威胁，而且，想要对印度海军进行封锁也是不可能的，因为实施封锁的水面舰艇会进入印度海军和空军的轰炸机和攻击机的打击范围之内，（它们）与美国海军甚至是英国皇家海军不同的是，它们缺乏保护其舰队免受地面攻击所需的空中支援火力。
The PLAAF has a distinct advantage, atleast on paper. With 3000+ combat aircraft supported by mid-air refuellers thePLAAF is a force to recon with. However apart from 250+ SU30MKK’s, 200+Su-27s and 200+ JF-17’s rest of these aircraft are vintage Chinese variants of MiG 19 andMiG 21s. In the context of Sino-Indian conflict, China has primarily 6 airbasesto launch strike aircraft from. However, all of these have altitudes in excessof 4000 ft, which means the strike aircraft taking off will be carrying lesserpayload. A PLAAF Su-30MKK for example, will take off with 6 AA missiles ratherthan 8. All IAF airbases bordering China primarily those in Bareilly, Tezpur,Hindon and Bagdodra, are at near sea level allowing Indian Su30MKI to takeoffat full payload.
至少在纸面数据上，中国空军具有明显的优势，它们拥有3000多架战斗机，有空中加油机能够提供支援。然而，除了250多架苏30、200多架苏27以及200多架JF-17之外，其余的飞机都是中国由米格19和米格21改型来的老旧机种。如果中国和印度发生冲突，中国的战斗机将在6个主要的空军基地起飞，然而，这些基地海拔都在1000米以上，这意味着这些飞机起飞时的有效载荷有限。比如中国军队的苏30只能搭载6枚防空导弹，而不是8枚，而所有与中国接壤的印度空军基地，主要包括巴雷利、泰兹普尔、印顿和巴格杜德拉，水平高度都和海平面接近，这使得印度空军的苏30战机能够满负荷起飞。

To conclude India vs China-Pakistan warwill end in stalemate at best, and won’t give any tacticalor strategic advantage to any nation. So much so that it’s motivationitself will be in doubt.
所以，印度和中国以及巴基斯坦的战争，最终会是一场僵局，不会给任何国家带来任何方面的好处。所以这场战争发动的动机本身就会让人质疑。
Mark Harrison
Mark Harrison, CTO, werarewe
Let us review the relative militarystrengths:
China is a world class power, with astructured and trained military
India has a military force more accustomedto 'local enforcement' actions, but not world-class
Pakistan is like a scaled down version ofIndia, aggressive, but less disciplined.
Sri Lanka has little military power.
Now, suppose Pakistan, China and Sri Lankadecided to invade India. India would be most worried by China.
让我们来看一下相关国家的军事实力：
中国是一个世界级的大国，拥有一支训练有素的军队。
印度的军事力量更倾向于“地方执法”级别，还达不到世界级的水平。
巴基斯坦类似一个缩小版的印度，侵略性强，但纪律性差。
斯里兰卡几乎就没有军事力量。
现在，假设巴基斯坦、中国和斯里兰卡决定入侵印度。印度最担心的会是中国。

However, suppose that this is not the case.Then it's a full offensive for strategic goals, with China determined to causemajor damage to India. India would be determined not to surrender. However,India might, in confusion, launch a larger than intended strike against SriLanka causing major damage. It is also likely that some Chinese offensiveswould cause collateral damage to Pakistan, which would combine with some Indiancounter-attack.
但如果，情况并非假设的这样，中国下定决心要对印度造成重大伤害，发动对战略目标的全面进攻的话，印度将不会投降。混乱之中，印度可能会对斯里兰卡发动一场比预期更大的打击，造成重大的伤害，中国的一些进攻也可能会对巴基斯坦造成附带伤害。
The Indian leadership would realise that,if they continued to fight China, the damage would be permanent. However, theyare a nuclear power. But then, China isa nuclear power too. Both of them would issue warnings about their intentionsto deploy nuclear weapons. Pakistan would also warn about its intentions todeploy nuclear weapons. India and China would not take this threat seriously,but Pakistan would repeat its threats. Again, India and China would point outthat nuclear weapons had a mutually assured destruction capability, but bothwould be nervous of Pakistans willingness to engage in such a strategy. Chinesecollateral damage against Pakistan would increase. As the situation escalated,the conventional battle between India and China would intensify, but both wouldremain non-nuclear.
印度领导人这时候会意识到，如果他们继续与中国作战，将会带来永久性的伤害。然而，他们是一个核武器国家，但中国也是一个核大国。两个国家都会对对方试图使用核武器发出警告，巴基斯坦也会威胁使用核武器，但印度和中国都不会认真地对待这一威胁，巴基斯坦会一再重复它的威胁，印度和中国会不断的重申：核武器具有相互摧毁的能力，但这两个国家都会对巴基斯坦的这种姿态感到紧张。中国对巴基斯坦的附带伤害将会增加，随着局势的升级，印度和中国之间的常规战争会加剧，但两个国家都不会使用核武器。
At this point, three other powers need tobe considered - the USA, the UK, and Russia. The USA is hostile to China andits policy towards Pakistan has swung.
